price: 124. Toen hun broeder Hoed tegen hen zei: “Zullen jullie Allah niet vrezen en Hem gehoorzamen?”
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum hūdun alā tattaqūna
